short_summary: Provide Program Planning Support to Natural Resources Canada
tags: Government Procurement, Optical Readers, Compute, Reader, Scannersreads
full_summary:
### Office of Energy Research and Development’s (OERD) - Program Planning Support

#### Tender Details
* **Solicitation Number**: 5000071369-B
* **Reference Number**: CB-6128-58054612
* **Title**: Support for the Office of Energy Research and Development’s (OERD) Program Planning
* **Tender Closure Date**: 2023-07-04T14:00:00
* **Contract Start Date**: 2023-08-01
* **Contract End Date**: 2024-03-31

#### Procurement Details
* **Procurement Category**: SRV
* **Procurement Method**: Competitive Selective Tendering
* **Notice Type**: Not Applicable (Notifiable)
* **Trade Agreements**: Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA), Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement, Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA), and others

#### Service Requirements
The successful bidder will be expected to provide Task and Solutions Professional Services to support the Office of Energy Research and Development’s (OERD) program planning and delivery phases.  

The services may include, but are not limited to:

* Recruiting project reviewers 
* Coordinating and facilitating review panel meetings
* Performing applicant/project analytics
* Coordinating and facilitating stakeholder sessions and advisory committees
* Providing additional support services as required

#### Selection Criteria
* **Selection Criteria**: Highest Combined Rating of Technical Merit and Price

#### Contracting Entity
* **Government Entity**: Natural Resources Canada
* **Address**: 580 Booth Street, Ottawa, ON, Canada, K1A 0E4

#### Contact Information
* **Contact Name**: Raymond Thai
* **Contact Email**: raymond.thai@NRCan-RNCan.gc.ca
* **Contact Phone**: (343) 543-7427

The full tender document can be accessed via the following links:
* English: [https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender\_notice/6128/npp-5000071369-b.pdf](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender\_notice/6128/npp-5000071369-b.pdf)
* French: [https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender\_notice/6128/apm-5000071369-b.pdf](https://canadab
